description:
This layer displays marine ecoregions in and around the CLME+ region. Marine ecoregions are a biogeographic classification of the coastal and continental shelf waters.  Hierarchically, nested above the marine ecoregion are realms and provinces.

Combining this layer with a land file will provide an approximate representation of the marine coverage of these marine ecoregions. 

Data source: The Nature Conservancy
name: CLME: Marine Ecoregions of the Wider Caribbean
